availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Sheets. Father of Eliza J. Sheets, Francis A. Sheets, Henry J. Sheets, Susan M. Sheets, John F. Sheets, Benjamin F. Sheets, and Charles A. Sheets. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1850 and 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 73B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 340
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 12
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Courthouse, p. 73A
